Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle
  • public class Triangle
extends Object
    A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
    Version:
    2018.11.26
    Author:
    Michael Kölling and David J. Barnes and Brian Dahlem

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Triangle()
      Create a new triangle at default position with default color.
      Triangle​(int x, int y, int width, int height, String color, boolean visible)
      Create a new triangle with a specified position and color.

    • Method Detail

      • makeVisible

        public void makeVisible()
        Make this triangle visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

      • makeInvisible

        public void makeInvisible()
        Make this triangle invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Determine if the triangle should be showing on the canvas
        Returns:
        true if the shape is not hidden

        Get the triangle's X position

        Determine the triangle's current height

        Change the triangle's width

        Change the triangle's height

      • moveRight

        public void moveRight()
        Move the triangle a few pixels to the right.

      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft()
        Move the triangle a few pixels to the left.

      • moveUp

        public void moveUp()
        Move the triangle a few pixels up.

      • moveDown

        public void moveDown()
        Move the triangle a few pixels down.

      • moveHorizontal

        public void moveHorizontal​(int distance)
        Move the triangle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to move the triangle along the x axis, positive to the right

      • moveVertical

        public void moveVertical​(int distance)
        Move the triangle vertically by 'distance' pixels.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to move the triangle along the y axis, positive down

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize​(int newHeight,
                       int newWidth)
        Change the size of the triangle (in pixels).
        Parameters:
        newHeight - the new height of the triangle, positive points up, negative points down
        newWidth - the new width of the triangle, must be > 0

      • changeColor

        public void changeColor​(String newColor)
        Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "cyan", "brown", "white", and "black", or rgb hex strings "#rrggbb" where rr, gg, bb are 2-hexit values for red, green, and blue levels.
        Parameters:
        newColor - a string naming the new color for the triangle
